# <Feature Name>

> Repeatable file template — copy into `docs/features/` when documenting a shipped feature.

- **Design:** ../design/<feature>.md
- **Spec:** ../specs/<feature>.md
- **Implementation Log:** ../implementation/<feature>.md (or ../archive/implementation/<feature>.md)
- **Related ADRs:** project/decisions/ADR-XXX.md, ...
- **Last Updated:** YYYY-MM-DD

## Overview

- Plain-language description of what this feature delivers.
- Player value and narrative framing.

## Key Concepts

- Components/resources involved.
- States or phases (with brief explanations).
- Data assets or configuration knobs.

## Controls & UX

- Input bindings, UI panels, or HUD indicators.
- Accessibility notes (alternate controls, colour cues).

## Operational Notes

- How to enable/disable or configure in game/data.
- Failure modes, edge cases, and recovery behaviour.
- Performance considerations or known limitations.

## Testing & Telemetry

- Recommended tests or debug commands to validate behaviour.
- Metrics or logs emitted for monitoring.

## Extension Hooks

- Ideas for future iterations or feature flags.
- TBD tracker references for outstanding work.

## Revision History

- YYYY-MM-DD – Summary of change (who)
- ...
